#summary Where and what do we click to test it?
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

A build is just a fancy name for a new, usually untested, version of the gadget.


= Details =

You can download new builds from the Downloads section, and if you have [www.desktop.google.com Google Desktop] installed, all you need to do is launch the .gg file. When they start to add up, become more stable and issues are getting resolved, the official web page will update the available .gg file to the wide public.
